channel.title: Uke Along Artist » The Beach Boys

item.title: The Beach Boys - I Can Hear Music - Key of D - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song I Can Hear Music performed by The Beach Boys. Chords used in the song: A, A7, D, D7, Em, F♯m, G, Gm.

item.title: The Beach Boys - In My Room - Key of C - Daniel Simmons
item.description: Play along video for the song In My Room performed by The Beach Boys. Chords used in the song: Am, B♭, C, Dm, G, G7.

item.title: The Beach Boys - Little Saint Nick - Baritone Ukulele - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Little Saint Nick performed by The Beach Boys. Chords used in the song: A, Am7, A♭dim7, C, D, D7, E7, Em, F, G, G6, G7, Gmaj7.

item.title: The Beach Boys - Little Saint Nick - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Little Saint Nick performed by The Beach Boys. Chords used in the song: A, Am7, A♭dim7, C, D, D7, E7, Em, F, G, G/E, G7, Gmaj7.

item.title: The Beach Boys - Good Vibrations - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Good Vibrations performed by The Beach Boys. Chords used in the song: A, A7, B7, B♭, C, C7, D, Dm, E, F, F♯m, G.

item.title: The Beach Boys - Surfin' U.S.A. - Key of C - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song Surfin' U.S.A. performed by The Beach Boys. Chords used in the song: C, F, G7.

item.title: The Beach Boys - Barbara Ann - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Barbara Ann performed by The Beach Boys. Chords used in the song: C, D, G.
